synopsis.text: Will love conquer all, even a corrupted divine system? Belldandy, a powerful goddess, faces the return of her once-imprisoned mentor, Celestin, who was punished for attempting to overthrow the Goddess system. Now free, Celestin manipulates the system, erasing Belldandy's memories of her beloved Keiichi. As chaos threatens to engulf both Earth and the celestial kingdom of Yggdrasil, Keiichi must navigate through Morgan Le Fey's enigmatic schemes to restore Belldandy's memories. Will their love prove to be Celestin's undoing, or will it become the final piece needed to shatter reality? Don't miss the exciting bonus episode featuring the Mini-Goddess after the movie!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
